title: Ticket #7719: Allow singularity to be configured to read from /dev/shm and sysv ipc
description: LIGO needs to run jobs under singularity that read from data prestaged into /dev/shm and System V style ipcs shared memory segments. Currently, singularity isolates these, which is what we want the default to stay. However, we'll provide a configuration that allows the admin to opt into this.
remarks:
2020-Jun-30 13:58:34 by gthain:
With this change, if you set

SINGULARITY_EXTRA_ARGS = --ipc=false -C=false -c

You'll be able to see the host's /dev/shm and ipcs shared memory segments.
